                <meta name="description" content="Download a PDF of "Immunization Safety Review" by the Institute of Medicine for free. Description: This eighth and final report of the Immunization Safety Review Committee examines the hypothesis that vaccines, specifically the measles-mumps-rubella (MMR) vaccine and thimerosal-containing vaccines, are causally associated with autism. The committee reviewed the extant published and unpublished epidemiological studies regarding causality and studies of potential biologic mechanisms by which these immunizations might cause autism. Immunization Safety Review: Vaccines and Autism finds that the body of epidemiological evidence favors rejection of a causal relationship between thimerosal-containing vaccines and autism. The book further finds that potential biological mechanisms for vaccine-induced autism that have been generated to date are only theoretical. It recommends a public health response that fully supports an array of vaccine safety activities and recommends that available funding for autism research be channeled to the most promising areas. The book makes additional recommendations regarding surveillance and epidemiological research, clinical studies, and communication related to these vaccine safety concerns.">

The book further finds that potential biological mechanisms for vaccine-induced autism that have been generated to date are only theoretical. It recommends a public health response that fully supports an array of vaccine safety activities and recommends that available funding for autism research be channeled to the most promising areas. The book makes additional recommendations regarding surveillance and epidemiological research, clinical studies, and communication related to these vaccine safety concerns.">

    /*Carousel Styles*/
    .img-responsive,.thumbnail>img,.thumbnail a>img,.carousel-inner>.item>img,.carousel-inner>.item>a>img {
      display:block;
      max-width:100%;
      height:auto
    }
    .carousel {
      position:relative
    }
    .carousel-inner {
      position:relative;
      overflow:hidden;
      width:100%
    }
    .carousel-inner>.item {
      display:none;
      position:relative;
      -webkit-transition:.6s ease-in-out left;
      transition:.6s ease-in-out left
    }
    .carousel-inner>.item>img,.carousel-inner>.item>a>img {
      line-height:1;
      min-height:180px;
      height:auto
    }
    .carousel-inner>.active,.carousel-inner>.next,.carousel-inner>.prev {
      display:block
    }
    .carousel-inner>.active {
      left:0
    }
    .carousel-inner>.next,.carousel-inner>.prev {
      position:absolute;
      top:0;
      width:100%
    }
    .carousel-inner>.next {
      left:100%
    }
    .carousel-inner>.prev {
      left:-100%
    }
    .carousel-inner>.next.left,.carousel-inner>.prev.right {
      left:0
    }
    .carousel-inner>.active.left {
      left:-100%
    }
    .carousel-inner>.active.right {
      left:100%
    }
    .carousel-control {
      position:absolute;
      top:0;
      left:0;
      bottom:0;
      width:15%;
      opacity:.5;
      filter:alpha(opacity=50);
      font-size:20px;
      color:#fff;
      text-align:center;
      text-shadow:0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.6)
    }
    .carousel-control.left {
      background-image:-webkit-linear-gradient(left,color-stop(rgba(0,0,0,.5) 0),color-stop(rgba(0,0,0,.0001) 100%));
      background-image:linear-gradient(to right,rgba(0,0,0,.5) 0,rgba(0,0,0,.0001) 100%);
      background-repeat:repeat-x;
      filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#80000000',endColorstr='#00000000',GradientType=1)
    }
    .carousel-control.right {
      left:auto;
      right:0;
      background-image:-webkit-linear-gradient(left,color-stop(rgba(0,0,0,.0001) 0),color-stop(rgba(0,0,0,.5) 100%));
      background-image:linear-gradient(to right,rgba(0,0,0,.0001) 0,rgba(0,0,0,.5) 100%);
      background-repeat:repeat-x;
      filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#00000000',endColorstr='#80000000',GradientType=1)
    }
    .carousel-control:hover,.carousel-control:focus {
      outline:0;
      color:#fff;
      text-decoration:none;
      opacity:.9;
      filter:alpha(opacity=90)
    }
    .carousel-control .icon-prev,.carousel-control .icon-next,.carousel-control .glyphicon-chevron-left,.carousel-control .glyphicon-chevron-right {
      position:absolute;
      top:50%;
      z-index:5;
      display:inline-block
    }
    .carousel-control .icon-prev,.carousel-control .glyphicon-chevron-left {
      left:10%
    }
    .carousel-control .icon-next,.carousel-control .glyphicon-chevron-right {
      right:10%
    }
    .carousel-control .icon-prev,.carousel-control .icon-next {
      width:20px;
      height:20px;
      margin-top:-10px;
      margin-left:-10px;
      font-family:serif
    }
    .carousel-control .icon-prev:before {
      content:'\2039'
    }
    .carousel-control .icon-next:before {
      content:'\203a'
    }
    .carousel-indicators {
      position:absolute;
      bottom:5px;
      left:50%;
      z-index:15;
      width:60%;
      margin-left:-30%;
      padding-left:0;
      list-style:none;
      text-align:center
    }
    .carousel-indicators li {
      display:inline-block;
      width:10px;
      height:10px;
      margin:1px;
      text-indent:-999px;
      border:1px solid #fff;
      border-radius:10px;
      cursor:pointer;
      background-color:#000 \9;
      background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0)
    }
    .carousel-indicators .active {
      margin:0;
      width:12px;
      height:12px;
      background-color:#fff
    }
    .carousel-caption {
      position:absolute;
      left:15%;
      right:15%;
      bottom:0;
      z-index:10;
      padding-top:20px;
      padding-bottom:20px;
      background:rgba(0,0,0,.3);
      /*background: rgba(255,255,255, .5);*/
      color:#fff;
      text-align:center;
      text-shadow:0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.6);
      font-size:1.25em;
      line-height:1em
    }
    .carousel-caption h1 {
      color:#fff
    }
    .carousel-caption .btn {
      text-shadow:none;
      background-color:#333;
      color:#fff;
      border-radius:5px;
      border:none;
      padding:15px
    }
    @media screen and (max-width: 768px) {

    @media screen and (max-width:556px) {

    @media screen and (min-width:768px) {
      .carousel-control .glyphicon-chevron-left,.carousel-control .glyphicon-chevron-right,.carousel-control .icon-prev,.carousel-control .icon-next {

        margin-left:-15px;
        font-size:30px
      }
      .carousel-caption {
        left:20%;
        right:20%;
        padding-bottom:30px
      }
      .carousel-indicators {
        bottom:0
      }
    }
  </style>

                          <h3><span class="icon-heading" data-icon=""></span> Authors</h3>
              <div class="book-author" itemprop="author">
                                  Immunization Safety Review Committee; <a href="/author/HPDP">Board on Health Promotion and Disease Prevention</a>; <a href="/author/HMD">Institute of Medicine</a>
                              </div>
                
                          <h3><span class="icon-heading" data-icon=""></span> Description</h3>
              <div class="book-description" itemprop="description"><p>This eighth and final report of the Immunization Safety Review Committee examines the hypothesis that vaccines, specifically the measles-mumps-rubella (MMR) vaccine and thimerosal-containing vaccines, are causally associated with autism. The committee reviewed the extant published and unpublished epidemiological studies regarding causality and studies of potential biologic mechanisms by which these immunizations might cause autism. <i>Immunization Safety Review: Vaccines and Autism</i> finds that the body of epidemiological evidence favors rejection of a causal relationship between thimerosal-containing vaccines and autism. The book further finds that potential biological mechanisms for vaccine-induced autism that have been generated to date are only theoretical. It recommends a public health response that fully supports an array of vaccine safety activities and recommends that available funding for autism research be channeled to the most promising areas. The book makes additional recommendations regarding surveillance and epidemiological research, clinical studies, and communication related to these vaccine safety concerns.</p>
</div>

  // Simplification of Barebones Lightbox Template
  // by Kyle Schaeffer - kyleschaeffer.com
  function lightbox(content) {
    if ($('#lightbox').size() === 0) {
      $('<div id="lightbox"/><div id="lightbox-shadow"/>')
        .appendTo('body');
    }
    $('#lightbox').empty().append(content);
    $('#lightbox, #lightbox-shadow').fadeIn();
  }
  function closeLightbox() {
    $('#lightbox, #lightbox-shadow').fadeOut(function() {
      $('lightbox').empty();
    });
    return false;
  }

  // Wrapper for all the places that call GB_showImage
  // in their onclick attribute
  function GB_showImage(title, image) {
    lightbox('<img src="' + image + '"/>');
    $('#lightbox, #lightbox-shadow').on('click', closeLightbox);
    return false;
  }

  // Save to MyNAP handler
  $('a.saveit').one('click', function(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    $.getJSON('/napsave.php', {
        type: 'shelf', 
        r: $(this).data('recordid')
      }, function(response) {
        $(e.target)
          .toggleClass('saveit saveit_active')
          .attr('href', '/mynap.php')
          .text('Added to Bookshelf');
    });
  });

  // Back To Top control
  $(function() {
    var offset = 220;
    var duration = 500;
    $(window).scroll(function() {
      if ($(this).scrollTop() > offset) {
        $('.back-to-top').fadeIn(duration);
      } else {
        $('.back-to-top').fadeOut(duration);
      }
    });
    $('.back-to-top').on('click', function(event) {
      event.preventDefault();
      $('html, body').animate({scrollTop: 0}, duration);
      return false;
    });
  });
</script>

      $('.truncate').dotdotdot({
        watch: true,
        lastCharacter: {
          remove: [' ', ',', ';', '.', '!', '?']
        }
      });
    });

    if ( $('.book-description').children().length > 1 ) {
      $('.book-description').children(':gt(0)').hide();
      $('.book-description').children(':first').after('<a href="#" class="readmore">[read full description]</a>');
      $('.book-description a.readmore').on('click', function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        $('.book-description').children(':gt(0)').fadeIn();
        $('.book-description a.readmore').remove();
        trackEvent('catalog', 'description', 'show');
      });
    }

    $('.status-popover, [data-content]').popover({
      trigger: 'hover',
      container: 'body'
    });

    $('.nav-tabs [href="#stats"]').one('shown.bs.tab', function(e) {
      $('#stats').load('/catalog/10997/stats');
    });

    $('.mobile-tab[data-target="#stats"]').one('click', function(e) {
      $('#stats').load('/catalog/10997/stats');
    });

    function openDefaultTab() {
      var hash = window.location.hash;
      var tabs = $('.nav-tabs>li>a').map(function() { return $(this).attr('href'); }).get();
      var index = tabs.indexOf(hash);
      if (index > 0) {
        $('.nav-tabs>li>a').eq(index).tab('show');
      }
    }
    openDefaultTab();

    $('.nav-tabs [data-toggle=tab]').one('shown.bs.tab', function() {
      var $target = $($(this).attr('href'));
      $target.find('iframe').attr('src', function(i, val) { return val; });
    });

    $('.nav-tabs [data-toggle=tab]').on('show.bs.tab', function(e) {
      trackEvent('catalog', 'tab', $(this).text());
      var target = $(this).attr('href');
      $('.mobile-tab[data-target="' + target + '"]').toggleClass('active');
    });

    $('.mobile-tab').on('click', function(e) {
      trackEvent('catalog', 'mobile-tab', $(this).text());
      e.preventDefault();
      var target = $(this).data('target');
      $(target).css({'opacity': 1}).toggle();
      $(this).toggleClass('active');
    });

    // Save to MyNAP handler
    $('a.action-add').one('click', function(e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      $.getJSON('/napsave.php', {
          type: 'shelf', 
          r: $(this).data('recordid')
        }, function(response) {
          $(e.target)
            .toggleClass('action-add action-add-active')
            .attr('href', '/mynap')
            .text('Added to Bookshelf');
          trackEvent('catalog', 'shelf', $(e.target).data('recordid'));
      });
    });

    $("[id$='modal']").on('show.bs.modal', function() {
      trackEvent('catalog', 'modal', $(this).attr('id'));
    }).on('hide.bs.modal', function() {
      trackEvent('catalog', 'modal', $(this).attr('id'));
    });

    $('.citation-formats a').on('click', function() {
      trackEvent('catalog', 'citation', $(this).text());
    });

    $('.email-this').on('click', function() {
      trackEvent('catalog', 'email', '10997');
    });

    $('.cover-block').on('click', function() {
      trackEvent('catalog', 'cover', 'show');
    });

    $('#related-books-rows').on('click', '.book-row a', function() {
      trackEvent('catalog', 'rows', $(this).closest('.book-row').data('title'));
    });

    $('#purchase .panel-heading a').on('click', function() {

    /**
     * Allow the user to customize the width and height of the widget,
     * but constrain the values to sizes that don't look bad.
     */
    Math.clamp = function(value, min, max) {
      return Math.max(min, Math.min(max, value));
    };
    updateEmbedCode = function(width, height) {
      width = width || 250;
      height = height || 350;
      var html = '<iframe width="' + width + '" height="' + height + '" '
        + 'src="//www.nap.edu/widget/10997" '
        + 'frameborder="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>';
      $('#embed-modal textarea.embed-code').val(html);
      $('#embed-modal .embed-preview iframe').width(width).height(height);
      $('#embed-modal .modal-dialog').width(width + 40);
      return true;
    };
    updateEmbedCode();
    $('#embed-modal input').on('change keyup', function() {
      var w = Math.clamp($('#embed-modal input.embed-width-input').val(), 250, 1000),
          h = Math.clamp($('#embed-modal input.embed-height-input').val(), 350, 500);
      updateEmbedCode(w, h);
    });

    $('#embed-modal textarea.embed-code').on('click focus', function() {
      $(this).select();
      trackEvent('embed', 'focus');
    });
